item.description:
I have volunteered the Meetup, along with volunteers from the Bicycle Coalition of Maine, to provide valet bike parking for the Old Port Festival! This is a great opportunity to get the word out about bicycle transportation, while providing a much-needed community service.

In addition to RSVP'ing here, please contact me to let me know what times you can help. I'm asking for a two-hour shift: 11 AM - 1 PM, 1-3 PM, or 3-5 PM, or an hour setup at 11 AM or tear-down at 5 PM. I'm keeping a spreadsheet of volunteer names (no contact info) that you might want to look at to see what times are available. Probably two volunteers for each time slot is fine. (I'll also be there to supervise the whole time.)

Combine two hours of hanging out around bikes and bike people, with visiting the Festival before or after your shift, and have a great day!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the canopy and the signs
item.name: Old Port Festival Valet Bike Parking
